story_summary: Alexey Fyodorovitch Karamazov is introduced as the third son of Fyodor Pavlovitch Karamazov, a landowner known for his senseless and vicious nature. Fyodor Pavlovitch married twice, first to Adelaïda Ivanovna, who eloped with him but soon left him for a divinity student, leaving their son Dmitri behind. After her death in Petersburg, Fyodor Pavlovitch reacted with a mixture of joy and sorrow, revealing his complex emotions.
evidence_quotes: Alexey Fyodorovitch Karamazov was the third son of Fyodor Pavlovitch Karamazov
she left the house and ran away from Fyodor Pavlovitch with a destitute divinity student
